definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
latter half (of a decade, century etc)

sentences.english: Europe will be in focus at the latter part of the week.
sentences.chinese: 本周后半段，欧洲将成为市场关注的焦点。

sentences.english: The attacks began late Wednesday and continued into Thursday morning.
sentences.chinese: 袭击从星期三后半夜开始，持续到星期四早晨。

sentences.english: It seems that he went away in the small hours.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎是在后半夜出走的。

sentences.english: He confessed to sleeping through the second half of the film.
sentences.chinese: 他承认电影后半部时他睡觉了。

sentences.english: I don't think I'll stick around for the back half of Lou.
sentences.chinese: 我认为我不会坚持度过卢的后半段时间。

sentences.english: As a result, I only witness the last half of your legendry career.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾只见证了您辉煌职业生涯的后半段。

sentences.english: During the first half of life, people look ahead to the second half.
sentences.chinese: 在前半生里，人们向前看后半生。

sentences.english: What could I do with the second half of my life to make it more meaningful than the first?
sentences.chinese: 要怎样才能让自己的后半生比之前更有意义？

sentences.english: It was founded in the late11th century and is today a trade and distribution center. Population, 345, 150.
sentences.chinese: 建于11世纪后半期，现在为贸易及商品批发中心。

sentences.english: Sometimes, I stayed up into the late night, surfing on the internet. I would hear the door open.
sentences.chinese: 偶尔，我上网到后半夜，水果店的卷闸门啷一声拉起。

sentences.english: I'm not afraid of you!' exclaimed Catherine, who could not hear the latter part of his speech.
sentences.chinese: 凯瑟琳大叫，她受不了他所说的后半段话。

sentences.english: The forecast calls for snow flurries later tonight.
sentences.chinese: 天气预报报道今天后半夜将有阵雪。

sentences.english: He came home after midnight, and what's moe, he was drunk.
sentences.chinese: 他后半夜才回来，而且醉醺醺的。

sentences.english: The day will be cloudy with a slight chance of some rain later tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今天多云，后半夜有少许可能有雨。

sentences.english: Q. You play Sharapova in the next round. Do you look at that as a revenge match?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有看到她今天比赛的后半段挥汗如雨的情景？

sentences.english: His sad voice to a vine life after made at a loss.
sentences.chinese: 那伤感的声音把一棵藤的后半生弄得不知所措。

definition: sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse
to wind up/to bring to an end/to finish
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
start of literary work/opening song of ballad in Tanci style 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2]
around/from beginning to end/all around/front and rear
